__e: I believe that Signaler and Daniel had the balls to do the right thing at the right time.
Dear God, I just ask that you would watch over little Oskar and I pray, oh, God, for a miracle for him.
But I did it for me, and I did it for you so we could at least try and say goodbye to him because he's gone, Oskar, he's gone and he's not coming back.
